hakan.name: Hakan Gencebecioglu
hakan.title: IPTV Streaming Expert & Founder
hakan.bio: IPTV enthusiast with over 5 years of experience testing streaming players across 15+ devices. Passionate about helping users find the perfect streaming setup and troubleshoot common issues.
credentials: Device compatibility specialist for Firestick, Apple TV, Android TV
Founded IPTV Guide to help streamers find the best solutions
